bibl.title: Question-Types in Medical Catechisms on Papyrus.
bibl.note: Paper read at a Workshop on Greco-Roman Scientific and Medical Writing held on 24 March 2007, at the Humanities Institute of Ireland, University College Dublin (UCD). - Introduction. - Parallels in Aëtius (and Aristotle). - Parallels in Medical Literature. - Conclusion. - P. 123: Appendix. [List of papyrus.]

bibl.title: Authorial Voices in Greco-Roman Technical Writing

bibl.seg: David Leith, Question-Types in Medical Catechisms on Papyrus.
Liba Taub & Aude Doody (edd.), Authorial Voices in Greco-Roman Technical Writing = AKAN-Einzelschriften. 7 (Trier, 2009) pp. 107-123.

Paper read at a Workshop on Greco-Roman Scientific and Medical Writing held on 24 March 2007, at the Humanities Institute of Ireland, University College Dublin (UCD). - Introduction. - Parallels in Aëtius (and Aristotle). - Parallels in Medical Literature. - Conclusion. - P. 123: Appendix.
